languages.text: {n}Новые астропаты были опасны для себя и окружающих. Их дикий неукрощенный талант приводил к ужасным манифестациям варпа в реальности, но жертвы эти были невеликой платой за то, что Даргонус продолжал слышать сво{mf|его|ю} госпо{mf|дина|жу} и обращаться к не{mf|му|й}.{/n}

{n}The new Astropaths were dangerous to both others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent caused horrifying warp manifestations, but the casualties were a small price to pay to allow Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Новые астропаты были опасны для себя и окружающих. Их дикий неукрощенный талант приводил к ужасным манифестациям варпа в реальности, но жертвы эти были невеликой платой за то, что Даргонус продолжал слышать сво{mf|его|ю} госпо{mf|дина|жу} и обращаться к не{mf|му|й}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The new astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent had led to the horrifying Warp manifestations in reality, but those victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

{n}The new astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent had led to the horrifying Warp manifestations in reality, but those victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

{n}The new Astropaths were dangerous to both others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent caused horrifying warp manifestations, but the casualties were a small price to pay to allow Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

{n}The new Astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent led to the materialisation of horrifying Warp manifestations into reality, but the victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

{n}The new Astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent led to the materialisation of horrifying Warp manifestations into reality, but the victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

{n}The new Astropaths were dangerous to both others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent caused horrifying warp manifestations, but the casualties were a small price to pay to allow Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

{n}The new Astropaths were dangerous to both others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent caused horrifying warp manifestations, but the casualties were a small price to pay to allow Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

{n}The new Astropaths were dangerous to both others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent caused horrifying warp manifestations, but the casualties were a small price to pay to allow Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这些新来的星语者十分危险，无论对他们自己还是对其他人而言都同样如此。他们狂野不羁的力量导致亚空间的恐怖之物侵入了真实世界。不过，达戈努斯和行商浪人之间恢复了顺畅的通讯，与此相比，那些受害者只能算是微不足道的代价。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new Astropaths were dangerous to both others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent caused horrifying warp manifestations, but the casualties were a small price to pay to allow Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这些新来的星语者十分危险，无论对他们自己还是对其他人而言都同样如此。他们狂野不羁的力量导致亚空间的恐怖之物侵入了真实世界。不过，达戈努斯和行商浪人之间恢复了顺畅的通讯，与此相比，那些受害者只能算是微不足道的代价。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los nuevos Astrópatas eran peligrosos tanto para los demás como para ellos mismos. Su talento salvaje e indomable provocó horribles manifestaciones de la disformidad, pero las víctimas fueron un pequeño precio por permitir a Dargonus oír y hablar con su {mf|maestro|maestra}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new Astropaths were dangerous to both others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent caused horrifying warp manifestations, but the casualties were a small price to pay to allow Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los nuevos Astrópatas eran peligrosos tanto para los demás como para ellos mismos. Su talento salvaje e indomable provocó horribles manifestaciones de la disformidad, pero las víctimas fueron un pequeño precio por permitir a Dargonus oír y hablar con su {mf|maestro|maestra}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}新しい感応通信官は、外部の者にとっても身内にとっても危険な存在だった。彼らの荒々しい未開の才能により、恐ろしい歪みの出現が現実となったが、ダルゴナスがその声を聞き、話すことができたことと比較すれば、犠牲者が出たことはほんの些細な損失でしか過ぎなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new Astropaths were dangerous to both others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent caused horrifying warp manifestations, but the casualties were a small price to pay to allow Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}新しい感応通信官は、外部の者にとっても身内にとっても危険な存在だった。彼らの荒々しい未開の才能により、恐ろしい<歪み>の出現が現実となったが、ダルゴナスがその声を聞き、話すことができたことと比較すれば、犠牲者が出たことはほんの些細な損失でしか過ぎなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ces nouveaux astropathes sont aussi dangereux pour les autres que pour eux-mêmes. Leurs talents incontrôlables et sauvages font apparaître d'abominables manifestations du Warp, mais les victimes en sont un faible prix à payer pour Dargonus qui peut enfin communiquer avec {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new Astropaths were dangerous to both others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent caused horrifying warp manifestations, but the casualties were a small price to pay to allow Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ces nouveaux astropathes sont aussi dangereux pour les autres que pour eux-mêmes. Leurs talents incontrôlables et sauvages font apparaître d'abominables manifestations du Warp, mais les victimes en sont un faible prix à payer pour Dargonus qui peut enfin communiquer avec {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die neuen Astropathen waren eine Gefahr für sich selbst und andere. Ihr wildes, ungezähmtes Talent verursachte entsetzliche Warp-Manifestationen, aber die Opfer waren ein geringer Preis dafür, dass Dargonus {mf|seinen Meister|seine Meisterin} hören und mit {mf|ihm|ihr} sprechen konnte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new Astropaths were dangerous to both others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent caused horrifying warp manifestations, but the casualties were a small price to pay to allow Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die neuen Astropathen waren eine Gefahr für sich selbst und andere. Ihr wildes, ungezähmtes Talent verursachte entsetzliche Warp-Manifestationen, aber die Opfer waren ein geringer Preis dafür, dass Dargonus {mf|seinen Meister|seine Meisterin} hören und mit {mf|ihm|ihr} sprechen konnte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yeni Astropatlar, hem diğerlerine hem de kendilerine karşı tehlike teşkil ediyordu. Ehlîleştirilmemiş becerileri, yüreklere dehşet salacak türden Öteboyut tezahürlerine sebep oldu. Yine de verilen tüm kayıplar, Dargonus'un efendisi ile iletişim kurmasına olanak sağlama yolunda ufak bir bedelden ibaret kaldı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new Astropaths were dangerous to both others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent caused horrifying warp manifestations, but the casualties were a small price to pay to allow Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yeni Astropatlar, hem diğerlerine hem de kendilerine karşı tehlike teşkil ediyordu. Ehlîleştirilmemiş becerileri, yüreklere dehşet salacak türden Öteboyut tezahürlerine sebep oldu. Yine de verilen tüm kayıplar, Dargonus'un efendisi ile iletişim kurmasına olanak sağlama yolunda ufak bir bedelden ibaret kaldı.{/n}
